attributes.action: make it compulsory that all exam boards offer the option of ancient history A-level!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ancient History has been abandoned as an A level option by the last board to offer it-OCR. This is an unbeleivable asault upon a well established and important subject that was growing in popularity. As the present government promises to improve the education of our young people surely it would be hipocritical of them not to force it's revival.
